characteristics.name: Six-shooter
characteristics.description: Each time you roll a 6, increase the weaponâ€™s tier by 1.

characteristics.name: Stationary
characteristics.description: Cannot move the same turn that you use this weapon. When you hit a target from Far, ignore all DEF.

characteristics.name: Collider Round
characteristics.description: Deals damage to RES, penetrates through multiple targets or barriers, dealing damage to all enemies in a line.

characteristics.name: Backstab
characteristics.description: If undetected, deals double damage or instantly incapacitate a non Elite or Dyna foe.

passives.name: Calculated
passives.description: In combat, when you end a round without moving or with stealth, gain +2d to your next attack.

passives.name: Ace
passives.description: Whenever you score a Critical, gain Stealth.

passives.name: Quiet
passives.description: Missing an attack does not reveal your position.
